message: Bob, I think a 70/30 split is fair to start. What do you think?
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. How about a 60/40 split? It's still in your favor, but considers the time pressure.
It seems like you're feeling the time pressure more than I am, Bob. Let's see how the next round goes.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise a bit.  65/35 seems fair considering the time pressure we both face.
Alice, we're running out of time!  This is my final offer before the shrinking pot makes it pointless.  55/45 is fair considering the circumstances.
Alright, Bob. 55/45 it is.  Let's not let this money disappear!
